> # Tender Announcement: Consultants for the Enabling Accessibility Fund (EAF)
> 
> ## Solicitation Details
> 
> * Solicitation Number: **100024014**
> * Solicitation Title: Consultants for the Enabling Accessibility Fund (EAF)
> * Publication Date: **2023-10-19**
> * Tender Closing Date and Time: **2023-11-20T14:00:00**
> * Expected Contract Start Date: **2023-11-27**
> * Expected Contract End Date: **2028-11-27**
> 
> ## Procurement Overview
> 
> Employment and Social Development Canada (ESDC) invites proposals from qualified consulting firms to provide subject-matter expertise in the field of construction and accessible design for the Enabling Accessibility Fund (EAF). The successful contractor will provide expert opinions on mid-sized projects and develop costing models for the EAF program.
> 
> Key objectives of this tender are:
> 
> * To assess and evaluate mid-sized projects from calls for proposals
> * To develop and update existing costing models for the EAF program
> * To develop flexible and scalable models or tools that assign flat rate costing for additional project activities
> 
> ## Evaluation Criteria
> 
> Proposals will be evaluated based on the following criteria:
> 
> * Activity 1: Develop and update tools regarding costing models
> * Activity 2: Conduct project evaluations and develop recommendations
> 
> ## Security Requirements
> 
> This solicitation includes security requirements. Please refer to PART 6 - SECURITY, FINANCIAL AND OTHER REQUIREMENTS of the solicitation document for details.
> 
> ## Contract Period and Extension
> 
> The period of any resulting contract will be from contract award to one year later. The resulting contract will include an irrevocable option to extend the contract term by up to four (4) additional one (1) year periods under the same conditions.
> 
> ## Contracting Authority
> 
> For more information, please contact:
> 
> Marco Quiroga  
> NC-SOLICITATIONS-GD@hrsdc-rhdcc.gc.ca  
> (343) 576-1429
